params.guardian_: The address of the guardian, which may set the

params.cToken: The cToken to get the underlying price of

getUnderlyingPrice(address).return: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

_acceptAdmin().notice: Accepts transfer of gaurdian rights. msg.sender must be pendingGaurdian

_setPendingAdmin(address).notice: Begins transfer of gaurdian rights. The newPendingGaurdian must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a listed cToken asset

setAdapterToToken(address,address).notice: Set the underlying price of a listed cToken asset
